Description:
Exception is thrown out when click "Data Binding" button.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v200708022-0927

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a chart binding to a data set, click "Data Binding" button.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
